name: lychee
description: Lychee is a self-hosted photo-management platform. It allows users to manage albums, upload photos, edit metadata, and share galleries with a clean, mobile-friendly interface ideal for personal or small teams.
features: Photo Management: Upload photos, Organize albums, Batch operations. Manage your photo collection efficiently.
Album Organization: Create albums, Nested albums, Smart albums. Structure your photos logically.
Metadata Editing: EXIF data, Tags and descriptions, Location info. Edit photo information easily.
Gallery Sharing: Public galleries, Password protection, Share links. Share photos with others securely.
Mobile-Friendly: Responsive design, Touch gestures, Mobile upload. Access photos from any device.
Search & Filter: Find photos, Filter by date, Tag search. Locate photos quickly.
Privacy Control: Self-hosted, Access permissions, Private albums. Keep your photos private.
Image Processing: Automatic thumbnails, Image optimization, Format conversion. Efficient photo storage.
